root.name: Family Trainer
root.description: OverviewThere are over a dozen single and multiplayer challenges based on outdoor challenges in the world of Family Trainer, such as river rafting, mine karting, log jumping, rope skipping and others. The activities take place in a variety of locations including jungle forests full of ancient ruins, a haunted mansion complete with hordes of zombies, and a fairytale world where riding on toys and floating amongst the clouds is the order of the day.
